meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The weeny kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The weeny flower bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The weeny ant tried to carry a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: The weeny pebble was easily lost in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The weeny star twinkled in the vast night sky.

meanings.sent1: I weeny that the sun will rise tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: He weenies he can fly if he jumps high enough.
meanings.sent4: They weeny in magic spells and potions.
meanings.sent5: We weeny in the power of positive thinking.
